Manager

Class ShowtimeManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • Manager.DataManager
      • Manager.ShowtimeManager

  • public class ShowtimeManager
extends DataManager
    Represents the ShowtimeManager of MoblimaApp that handles the creating, updating, removing of showtimes.
    Since:
    2017-11-16

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String SHOWTIME_PATH

        public static final java.lang.String SHOWTIME_PATH
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static ShowtimeManager getInstance()
        This method to ensure that only one instance of showtimeManager is created so that if no such Object is created yet, it will create a new showtimeManager object else it will return the existing created showtimeManager object.
        Returns:
        instance The instance of showtimeManager that is already created.

      • getShowtimeObject

        public Showtime getShowtimeObject(java.lang.String title,
                                  java.lang.String showtime,
                                  java.lang.String day)
        This method is to get the particular showtime object to access the showtime data for setting of layout.
        Parameters:
        title - The inputed title to identify the showtimes available.
        showtime - The inputed showtime to narrow the showtimes available to the inputed showtime.
        day - The inputed day to narrow all the showtimes of the day to only the showtimes available on the inputed ady.
        Returns:
        Showtime Showtime object that is identified by title, showtime and day.

      • getMovieShowtimeList

        public java.util.List<Showtime> getMovieShowtimeList(java.lang.String title)
        This method gets the list of all showtime objects of the inputed title.
        Parameters:
        title - The inputed title to view the movie showtimes.
        Returns:
        tempMovieShowtime The list of showtime objects based on the inputed title.

      • getShowtimeList

        public java.util.List<Showtime> getShowtimeList()
        This method gets a whole list of showtime objects.
        Returns:
        showtimeList The list of all the showtime objects.

      • getMovieShowtimes

        public java.util.List<Showtime> getMovieShowtimes(java.lang.String title,
                                                  java.lang.String day)
        This method gets a whole list of showtime objects based on the selected day for a particular movie.
        Parameters:
        title - The title of the movie to get its showtimes.
        day - The selected showday.
        Returns:
        tempList List of all the showtime objects based on the day and title.

      • getShowtimeObjectByIndex

        public Showtime getShowtimeObjectByIndex(int index)
        This method returns the showtime object by index of the showtimeList.
        Parameters:
        index - The index of the showtimeList.
        Returns:
        Showtime showtime object based on the index inputed.

      • getHallShowtimeList

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getHallShowtimeList(java.lang.String hallCode,
                                                            java.lang.String day)
        This method returns a list of all showtimes based on hallCode.
        Parameters:
        hallCode - The unique hallCode to identify the hall.
        day - The day of the show time selected.
        Returns:
        hallShowtimeList The hallShowtime list of a particular hall based on hallCode.

      • getHallShowtimeHash

        public java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.util.List<java.lang.String>> getHallShowtimeHash(java.lang.String hallCode,
                                                                                                java.lang.String title)
        This method returns a hash map of an inputed title with all the halls and their corresponding showtimes which are in a list.
        Parameters:
        hallCode - The unique hallCode to identify the hall.
        title - The title to search for the showtimes of this movie.
        Returns:
        dayOfShowtimes Hash map of the different days

      • displayDayOption

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> displayDayOption(int numOfDays)
        This method allows the input of the number of days to choose from for making amendments to the particular day's showtime. This method also allows the setting of dates when assigning a public holiday.
        Parameters:
        numOfDays - The number of days to display, starting from tomorrow's date.
        Returns:
        dayList The list of the days consisting of tomorrow's date to the date which is specified by numOfDays.

      • displayTimeOption

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> displayTimeOption(int minInterval,
                                                          int day)
        This methods allow choosing the time slots of the selected day for making amendments to showtime.
        Parameters:
        minInterval - The minute interval to display a whole range of time with the inputed interval.
        day - The number of days from today's date to identify the selected day.
        Returns:
        timeList List of time slots to be displayed for the selected day.

      • getPHList

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getPHList()
        This method returns a list of all assigned public holiday.
        Returns:
        List of all the public holidays.

      • getDayRateHash

        public java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Double> getDayRateHash()
        This method returns all the day types (i.e weekday, weekend, PHDays) and their corresponding rates.
        Returns:
        HashMap The hashmap of all the day types and their rates.

      • setPHDay

        public void setPHDay(java.lang.String toBePH)
        This method allows the adding of public holiday.
        Parameters:
        toBePH - The selected day to be assigned as a public holiday.

      • addShowtime

        public Showtime addShowtime(java.lang.String title,
                            java.lang.String showtime,
                            java.lang.String day,
                            java.lang.String hallCode,
                            int maxCapacity)
        This method allows the adding of a new showtime of a particular movie with the selected showtime.
        Parameters:
        title - The movie title to add its showtime for screening.
        showtime - The inputed showtime to set to the movie for screening.
        day - The inputed showday to set to the movie for screening.
        hallCode - The unique hallCode to identify which hall to screen this movie.
        maxCapacity - The maximum capacity of the hall.
        Returns:
        Showtime The showtime object that has been created based on the inputs.

      • removeShowtime

        public boolean removeShowtime(Showtime showtime)
        This method allows the removal of a particular showtime object.
        Parameters:
        showtime - The showtime object to be removed.
        Returns:
        true if removal is successful, else false.

      • removeShowtimeByTitle

        public void removeShowtimeByTitle(java.lang.String title)
        This method allows the removal of showtime object based on title.
        Parameters:
        title - The title to remove its showtime.

      • updateTitle

        public void updateTitle(java.lang.String newInformation,
                        java.lang.String title)
        This method updates the title of a movie.
        Parameters:
        newInformation - The new title to update to.
        title - The existing title to be changed.

      • updateShowtime

        public void updateShowtime(int indexToUpdate,
                           java.lang.String showtime)
        This method updates the showtime of a movie.
        Parameters:
        indexToUpdate - The index of the showtimeList to identify the showtime object for updating.
        showtime - The new showtime to update to.

      • updateDay

        public void updateDay(int indexToUpdate,
                      java.lang.String day)
        This method updates the day of a movie.
        Parameters:
        indexToUpdate - The index of the showtimeList to identify the day object for updating.
        day - The new day to update to.

      • updateHallCode

        public void updateHallCode(int indexToUpdate,
                           java.lang.String hallCode)
        This method updates the hallCode of a movie.
        Parameters:
        indexToUpdate - The index of the showtimeList to identify the hallCode object for updating.
        hallCode - The new hallCode to update to.

      • updateMaxCapacity

        public void updateMaxCapacity(int indexToUpdate,
                              int maxCapacity)
        This method updates the maxCapacity of a movie.
        Parameters:
        indexToUpdate - The index of the showtimeList to identify the maxCapacity object for updating.
        maxCapacity - The new maxCapacity to update to.

      • updateLayout

        public void updateLayout(Showtime showtimeObj,
                         int maxColumn,
                         int userRow,
                         int userColumn)
        This method updates the layout of a particular showtime after a selection of seat has been made.
        Parameters:
        showtimeObj - The showtime object to be changed.
        maxColumn - The maximum number of columns.
        userRow - The selected row to book.
        userColumn - The selected column to book.

      • updateDayRate

        public void updateDayRate(java.lang.String dayType,
                          double rate)
        This method updates the day type and its corresponding rate.
        Parameters:
        dayType - The day type to be updated.
        rate - The rate to be updated.

      • save

        public boolean save()
        This method saves the updated showtimeList to the file path.
        Returns:
        true if saving is successful, else false.
